meanings.definition: A member of a South African people living mainly in KwaZulu-Natal province.
meanings.sent2: Many Zulu people wear colorful traditional attire.
meanings.sent3: The Zulu chief told a funny story at the gathering.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter echoed through the room like a Zulu drum.
meanings.sent5: The Zulu culture is rich in vibrant dances and songs.

meanings.definition: The Bantu language of the Zulus, a language of South Africa.
meanings.sent1: I am learning to speak Zulu fluently.
meanings.sent2: Zulu is one of the official languages of South Africa.
meanings.sent3: The children giggled as they tried to pronounce Zulu words.
meanings.sent4: His words flowed smoothly, like a river in Zulu.
meanings.sent5: The beauty of Zulu poetry captivated the audience.
